activities:
Gray Consulting (Gray) is a B2B provider of corporate meeting and event planning services.  Each client provides a list of meeting attendees that will be invited to their event.  Gray will contact these individuals (where applicable and when requested) and through online/offline methods, communicate with them and collect personal information to help facilitate their participation in a meeting or event.  We collect as little information as possible and provide that information to third-party party travel and venues (as needed) to help facilitate meeting arrangements for each attendee.  

Basic information (as requested by our client) includes:  First name, Last/Sur  Name, Mailing Address, Bank Details for Wire transfer of expense reimbursement (where permissible by country) and travel information where applicable.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: First name, Last/Sur  Name, Address, Bank Details for Wire transfer (where permissible by country) and travel information where applicable.  This information can be collected online and offline.  Manual processing does take place.
